field.value:
Create a new monorails project only home/index.rails and publish to a new server, then i test simulate 10 users and 5 seconds click, the w3wp.exe always >90% . Every request against the server results in a high CPU peak on the webserver. With only 2-3 people surfing on the site at the same time there is a request load time for 7-8 seconds. With more people the request load is as much as 20-30 seconds.
After some tests we have tried to create a new monorail project with only home/index.rails and found that the problem is still there. meaning it is likely that there is a problem with the monorail configuration.
